species.name: Bothans
SpecialAbility: Bothans begin the game with one rank in Streetwise.
Also start with one rank in Convincing Demeanor talent

species.name: Droids
SpecialAbility: Droids do not need to eat sleep or breathe and are unaffected by toxins and poisons.
Droids have a cybernetic implant cap of 6 instead of their brawn rating.
After selecting career a droid PC may train 6 of the 8 career skills.
After choosing specialization may train 3 of 4 specialization skills.
Inorgainic: Do not gain benefits of bacta tanks, stims or medicine checks. May attempt repairs with Mechanics check, uses emergency repair kits to heal quickly.
Droids start the game with onerank in the enduring talent
Driods cannot become force users or acquire force ratings. Although they cannot be affected by mind altering force powers.

species.name: Gands
SpecialAbility: Gands begin the game with one rank in discipline.
2 main species ones with lungs and ones without. A player may choose between the 2:
Gands with lungs breathe ammonia gas mixture. Starts the game with ammonia respirator and treats oxygen as a dangerous atmosphere but gains 10 XP to start.
Gands without lungs are immune to suffocation (Not immune to the vacuum of space)

species.name: Humans
SpecialAbility: Humans start the game with 2 differnet non-career skills of thier choice

species.name: Rodians
SpecialAbility: Rodians begin with 1 rank of Survival.
Start with Expert Tracker talent.

species.name: Trandoshans
SpecialAbility: Trandoshans begin with 1 rank of Preception

Regeneration: Whenever a Trandoshan would recover wounds from natural rest or bacta tank recover an additonal wound. Does not recover from medical treatments or stims. Trandoshans can regrow limbs although takes a month before even usable.
Claws: When making brawl checks deals +1 damage and has crit of 3.

species.name: Twi'Leks
SpecialAbility: Twl'leks start with 1 rank in either charm or deception.
Can remove setbacks imposed due to hot or arid conditions.

species.name: Wookies
SpecialAbility: Wookies begin the game with 1 rank in brawl.
Wookie Rage: When suffered any wounds deal +1 damage on brawl or melee attacks, +2 if critically injured

species.name: Besalisk
SpecialAbility: Besalisk begin the game with 1 rank of Resilience.
Additional Limbs: Besalisks have multiple sets of arms. As a result they gain an additional free maneuver per turn, though still may not perform more than 2 maneuvers.

species.name: Dug
SpecialAbility: Dugs begin the game with one rank in Brawl.
Begin the game with Defensive Driving Talent

species.name: Mustafarian
SpecialAbility: 2 Subsets of Mustafarians a Player will pick one of the following:
Northern Mustafarian:
Remove 2 setbacks from checks to resist arid or hot enviromental conditions.
Gain one rank in the Eye for Detail talent.
Sourthern Mustafarian:
remove 2 setbacks for arid or hot enviromental conditions.
Gain Enduring talent.

species.name: Aqualish
SpecialAbility: All Aqualish can breathe underwater and gain one rank of Brawl
Then there are 3 sub species of Aqualish:
Aquala: Begin with 1 rank in Resilience, remove a setback due to cold or wet conditions.
Ualaq: Begin with 1 rank of Survival or Perception. May remove 1 setback due to dark conditions but gain 1 setback for bright condtions.
Quara: gain 1 rank in athletics or Coercion. May remove setback when attempting to track anything through a natural enviroment

species.name: Klatooinian
SpecialAbility: Klatooinians begin with either brawl, Ranged(heavy) or Ranged(light).
Start 1 rank of one non-career skill.

species.name: Weequay
SpecialAbility: Weequay begin with Resilience or Athletics.
Weequay can communicate with other Weequays using pheromones. This is completely non-verbal, an undetectable to any other species nearby. Only can communicate in short range.

species.name: Hutts
SpecialAbility: Hutts begin the game with 1 rank in Enduring Talent
Also one rank of Nobody's Fool talent.
Hutts begin game with one rank of Coercion or Discipline.
Ponderous: A hutt can never spend more than 1 maneuver moving per turn.

species.name: Ganks
SpecialAbility: Ganks begin the game with 1 rank in Coercion or Vigilance.
Cyborg: All Ganks are cyborgs. A Gank begins play with up to 2 cybernetics that total up to 5,000 credits.
Ganks have an implant cap of 3 plus brawn.

species.name: Niktos
SpecialAbility: There are 3 types of Nikitos each with there own special abilities:
Kajain'sa Nikitos(Red):
Gain one rank of Resilence
May remove setback due to hot or arid conditions.
Kadas'sa Nikitos(Green):
Gain one rank of Coodination.
Gain bosot die to athletics chcks to climb trees and other surfaces that their claws can pentrate
Claws: +1 damage and crit rating of 3.
Esral'sa Nikitos(Mountain):
gain 1 rank of Survival.
Gain Natural Outdoorsman talent.
Gluss'sa Nikitos(Pale):
Gain 1 rank of Athletics
Swimmer: Never suffers movement penalties for traveling through water and can hold breath for a number of rounds equal to twice his Brawn rating before beginning to drown
M'shento'su Nikitos(Southern):
1 rank of perception
Gain boost to perception and vigilance checks to detect sounds.

species.name: Sakiyans
SpecialAbility: Begin with 1 rank in Perception or Vigilance.
Also start with 1 rank of expert tracker.

species.name: Falleen
SpecialAbility: Begin with 1 rank of Charm.

Beguiling Pheromones: By emitting pheromones and altering their skin color, Falleen can affect emotional states of other sentients, once per check as an incidental. Can also also suffer 2 strain to upgrade the ability of a charm, deception or negotiation check on a living being wihtin short range. This has no affect on targets with breath masks or respiratory systems.

species.name: Gotal
SpecialAbility: Start with 1 rank in perception.

Energy Sensitivity: The head cones of gotal are finely tuned sensory organs. Once per encounter as a manuever may sense the presence and current emotional states of all living things in a short range.

species.name: Quarren
SpecialAbility: Begin with 1 rank of negotiation
Amphibious: can breathe underwater without penalty and never suffer movement penalty traveling through water.
Ink Spray: Once per encounter as an out of turn incidental may suffer 2 strain to add 1 setback to a combat check made within short range, in water add 3 setback.

species.name: Clawdite
SpecialAbility: Begin the game with 1 rank in Resilience
Changeling: as an action may suffer 3 strain and an average resilience check. If success changes apperance to match that of a silhourtte 1 character whom has observed before.

species.name: Devaronian
SpecialAbility: Start with 1 rank in survival or deception.
Resilient Metabolism: Devorians are naturally hardy and resistant to toxins. Add automatic success to all resilience checks.

species.name: Kalleran
SpecialAbility: Kallerans begin with 1 rank of streetwise.
Hypersensitive Antennae: begin with Heightened Awareness Talent.

species.name: Drall
SpecialAbility: Start with 1 rank in Knowledge(Education)
When assisting others in addition to usnig his skill or charactersitic rating adds another boost die
